name: Solid Flight
description:
You are a licensed pilot and contract employee at Goldal Town Airport. You earn money delivering mail to remote homesteads in a mountainous area. You can rent a plane and fly wherever you want, explore the area and hunt animals. You can buy all the planes, and when you have saved enough money you can buy a stunt plane.

Airplanes can run out of fuel, you can get lost because you can only navigate with a map and compass, different weather conditions can affect the flight.
